snippet.title: Revival: Recolonization - Full Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1306770/Revival_Recolonization/ 

4X Revival: Recolonization will reach the 1.0 PC release on April 11, 2024. The 1.0 demo is available on the Steam page right now.
